[@cel](@f/6sQ6d2CMxRUhLpspgGIulDxDCwYD7DzFzPNr7u5AU=.ed25519) Thanks for sharing that trick, I've just added that flag to my pub.

[@punkmonk](@EaYYQo5nAQRabB9nxAn5i2uiIZ665b90Qk2U/WHNVE8=.ed25519) Another trick I'm using on [my Raspberry Pi](@gTsBPQbdSd763h0qoZsBjPlgWbhKKmMFW8kmTv/XrV8=.ed25519):

```
while true; do timeout 1h npm start; done
```

I have my Scuttlebot running from an `npm start`, but you can replace that bit. The key is that it does a quick restart every hour, which is (for me) negligible downtime in exchange for never having a lockup last more than an hour.
